text: Asif Basra (27 July 1967 â€“ 12 November 2020) was an Indian actor. He was best known for his role as Puro in the American comedy movie Outsourced (2006). He was born in Amravati, Maharashtra. His career began in 1998. Basra hung himself on 12 November 2020 at his home in Dharamshala, Himachal Pradesh at the age of 53. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Suicides by hanging Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Indian stage actors Category:Indian voice actors Category:People from Himachal Pradesh
title: Asif Basra
